## Details

This is a take home, open book exam handled in [Moodle]({{< var course_params.moodle_link >}}), no on-campus presence needed. The exam is the same for the on-campus and distance sections. You can use any on-line and printed resources, but the responses should be your own work. Questions will be available in Moodle. See the Schedule for the dates.
